Package commands

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • commands.Options
  • public class Options
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a manager for all the movement commands in the game
    Author:
    Nadim Rahman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Options​(Command up, Command down, Command left, Command right)
      This class initialises the key variables

    • Constructor Detail

      • Options

        public Options​(Command up,
               Command down,
               Command left,
               Command right)
        This class initialises the key variables
        Parameters:
        up - is the command for vertical up movement
        down - is the command for vertical down movement
        left - is the command for horizontal left movement
        right - is the command for horizontal right movement

        Parameters:
        img - is the image string when up movement happens
